article.title: Dialectometric analysis of language variation in Twitter

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the heatmap in Figure 1 primarily illustrate?
choices: The distribution of all European languages on Twitter.
The geographic concentration of Spanish tweets in Europe.
The linguistic diversity of Spanish across different age groups.
The impact of major roads on language use in Spain.

multiple_choice_question.text: Figure 2 demonstrates the spatial distribution of different Spanish words used for the same concept. Which of these concepts is NOT represented in the figure?
What do the differing colors in Figure 3 represent?
choices: Linguistic distances between regions for the concept "cold".
The frequency of different words used for "cold" across Spain.
The popularity of Twitter in different Spanish cities.
The geographic distribution of two major Spanish dialects.

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the purpose of Formula (4) in the context of the article?
choices: To calculate the average number of tweets per geographic cell.
To determine the most frequently used word for a specific concept.
To quantify the overall linguistic distance between two geographic regions.
To identify the reference cell for calculating linguistic distance.
